faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subTitle: WE ARE HERE TO ANSWER YOUR QUESTIONS

1.a:
Yes, we ship all over the world. We currently ship to 65+ countries. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout.

Currently Free Shipping applies on orders over 85$.

We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals on shipping.

2.q: How long will it take to get my orders?
2.a: We are currently experiencing a very high order volume, all orders will be dispatched within 24-48 hours, and shipping will take around 5-7 business days depending on your location. We ship to all countries except some Islands. Delivery details will be provided during checkout & in your confirmation email.

3.q: Do you ship to my country?
3.a: We excluded countries we can not ship to, from checking out. This means if you are able to check-out, we can ship to your country.

4.a: You can return a product for any reason within 14-days guaranteed. No questions asked. We do not charge a return or handling fee. The customer only has to bear the return label.

5.a: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

faq.paragraph: Need more help? Our support team is here for you.
